languages.text: "Успокойся, ты будешь прислуживать губернатору, которого я назначу из верных мне людей. И докладывать мне о каждом его движении".

traits.locale_text: "Поэтому ты будешь прислуживать губернатору, которого я назначу — из своих людей".

languages.text: "Relax. You will serve whatever governor I appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report their every movement to me."
languages.original_text: "Успокойся, ты будешь прислуживать губернатору, которого я назначу из верных мне людей. И докладывать мне о каждом его движении".

traits.locale_text: "Calm down. You will serve a governor I am going to appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report his every movement to me."
"Calm down. You will serve a governor I am going to appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report his every movement to me."
"Relax. You will serve whatever governor I appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report his every movement to me."
"Relax. You will serve whatever governor I appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report his every movement to me."
"Relax. You will serve whatever governor I appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report their every movement to me."
"Relax. You will serve whatever governor I appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report their every movement to me."

languages.text: “别担心，我会从我信任的人里挑选总督，而你负责侍奉新任总督。你需要把新任总督的一举一动都汇报给我。”
languages.original_text: "Relax. You will serve whatever governor I appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report their every movement to me."

traits.locale_text: “别担心，我会从我信任的人里挑选总督，而你负责侍奉新任总督。你需要把新任总督的一举一动都汇报给我。”

languages.text: 「落ち着け。{mf|俺|私}が信用できる忠実な者の中から指名する総督に従うことになる。そして、その動きをすべて{mf|俺|私}に報告するのだ」
languages.original_text: "Relax. You will serve whatever governor I appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report their every movement to me."

traits.locale_text: 「落ち着け。{mf|俺|私}が信用できる忠実な者の中から指名する総督に従うことになる。そして、その動きをすべて{mf|俺|私}に報告するのだ」

languages.text: «Tranquila. Servirás al gobernador que designe de entre un grupo de individuos en cuya lealtad pueda confiar. Y me informarás de todos y cada uno de sus movimientos».
languages.original_text: "Relax. You will serve whatever governor I appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report their every movement to me."

traits.locale_text: «Tranquila. Servirás al gobernador que designe de entre un grupo de individuos en cuya lealtad pueda confiar. Y me informarás de todos y cada uno de sus movimientos».

languages.text: "Germe kendini. Güvenebileceğim insanlar arasından atayacağım bir valiye hizmet edeceksin. Valinin her hareketini bana bildireceksin."
languages.original_text: "Relax. You will serve whatever governor I appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report their every movement to me."

traits.locale_text: "Germe kendini. Güvenebileceğim insanlar arasından atayacağım bir valiye hizmet edeceksin. Valinin her hareketini bana bildireceksin."

languages.text: « Du calme. Vous servirez le gouverneur que je nommerai parmi ceux dont la loyauté m'est acquise. Et vous me rapporterez le moindre de ses faits et gestes. »
languages.original_text: "Relax. You will serve whatever governor I appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report their every movement to me."

traits.locale_text: « Du calme. Vous servirez le gouverneur que je nommerai parmi ceux dont la loyauté m'est acquise. Et vous me rapporterez le moindre de ses faits et gestes. »

languages.text: "Entspannt Euch. Ich werde aus Leuten, auf deren Loyalität ich vertrauen kann, einen Gouverneur ernennen, und Ihr werdet ihm dienen. Und Ihr werdet mir jede seiner Aktionen melden."
languages.original_text: "Relax. You will serve whatever governor I appoint from among people whose loyalty I can trust. And you will report their every movement to me."

traits.locale_text: "Entspannt Euch. Ich werde aus Leuten, auf deren Loyalität ich vertrauen kann, einen Gouverneur ernennen, und Ihr werdet ihm dienen. Und Ihr werdet mir jede seiner Aktionen melden."
